TopicTitle: Are the show and tell videos under Creative Commons Atribution?

Articles.Content: I w a got make a video about the KSP2 newest show and tell videos it’s just that, I dont want to get sued or break any laws so. Can I use them for outline. I’m trying to get more people about the game.
The forum thread and video description don't state any license for those videos, so they would default to All Rights Reserved, which means you can't do anything with them other than watch them.
You are gonna have to ask Kerbsteinburgkerman for a answer. Best lawyer on Kerbin!

There is a doctrine in U.S. called Fair Use. Of particular importance are the "fair use factors," and I would especially point out, "purpose and character of use," and "amount and substantiality." I can't advise you on whether what you're planning constitutes fair use, but you can read the article yourself to see if you think it applies in your case.

That said, you will always have better chances of avoiding a conflict if you get permission in advance. I don't see any sort of PR contact, but you can always just at them on Twitter.

On 2/21/2021 at 11:41 AM, Dr. Kerbal said:

I w a got make a video about the KSP2 newest show and tell videos it’s just that, I dont want to get sued or break any laws so. Can I use them for outline. I’m trying to get more people about the game.

Thank you for asking! You can show our footage in your video when talking about the latest Show and Tell, however, we ask that you credit us as the source and link back to our original Show and Tell video in your video description.

Thank you for asking! You can show our footage in your video when talking about the latest Show and Tell, however, we ask that you credit us as the source and link back to our original Show and Tell video in your video description. 

Don’t worry! I always credit things. It just so professional. And thank you for giving me permission to use footage.
Got the video uploaded! I credit the devs and linked the video back to the original source. And if anyone is wondering here is the link to the video I uploaded:
